snippet: Jerry Seinfeld and Sony Pictures Television will produce a second season of the experimental Internet series “Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee.”
abstract: Jerry Seinfeld and Sony Pictures Television will produce second season of experimental Internet series Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee; show is attempt to branch into medium other than television and to discover if original, network-quality entertainment can emerge from Internet.
lead_paragraph: Jerry Seinfeld and Sony Pictures Television will produce a second season of the experimental Internet series “Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee.”

headline.seo: Seinfeld to Continue ‘Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee’
headline.main: Still Riffing Over Coffee Cups, Seinfeld Renews a Web Series
headline.print_headline: Still Riffing Over Coffee Cups, Seinfeld Renews a Web Series
